channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump Helped Argentina Face an Economic Meltdown. It Came At a Cost.
item.description: When President Javier Milei of Argentina faced an economic meltdown, President Trump vowed to come to his aid. But that lifeline is coming at a cost.

item.title: Judge Temporarily Blocks Trump From Firing Government Workers During Shutdown
item.description: Labor groups are set to square off against the Trump administration one day after the president renewed his threat to cut “Democrat programs.”

item.title: The Supreme Court Case That Could Hand the House to Republicans
item.description: Democrats would be in danger of losing around a dozen majority-minority districts across the South if the court struck down part of the Voting Rights ...

item.title: MacKenzie Scott Gives $40 Million to African American Cultural Heritage Action Fund
item.description: The gift is twice the amount Ms. Scott contributed to the African American Cultural Heritage Action Fund in 2021.

item.title: Trump Helped Argentina Face an Economic Meltdown. It Came At a Cost.
item.description: When President Javier Milei of Argentina faced an economic meltdown, President Trump vowed to come to his aid. But that lifeline is coming at a cost.

item.title: Israel Begins Burying Its Dead Hostages
item.description: With the bodies of 10 people returned from Gaza, Israelis elated by the release of hostages began mourning those who did not make it home alive.

item.title: In the Middle East, It’s Right Vs. Right
item.description: Who would have imagined I’d ever praise something Trump did in the world of foreign policy?

item.description: Uno de los géneros más escuchados en las Américas, los fotógrafos Karla Gachet e Iván Kashinsky documentan la cumbia en Colombia, México, Ecuador, Per...

item.title: Supreme Court seems poised to further undercut the Voting Rights Act
item.description: The court's conservative majority could invalidate the section of the Voting Rights Act aimed at ensuring that minority voters are not shut out of the...

item.title: Hegseth orders troops to watch his speech decrying a 'woke' military
item.description: During the speech last month, Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth lectured senior military officials on the "warrior ethos," focusing on fitness and groomi...

item.title: Video: How cumbia arrived in Monterrey, Mexico
item.description: A look at how cumbia found a second home in Mexico's "Little Colombia."

item.title: The federal government is still shut down. Here's what that means across the country
item.description: The federal government is currently shut down. The NPR Network is following the ways the government shutdown is affecting services across the country.

item.title: Trump Administration Authorizes Covert C.I.A. Action in Venezuela
item.description: The development comes as the U.S. military is drawing up options for President Trump to consider, including possible strikes inside the country.

item.title: A Repressive Russian Ally Feels a Mysterious Thaw From the U.S.
item.description: Analysts say they are unsure what the Trump administration hopes to get out of its gifts and concessions to Belarus’s autocratic leader.

item.title: China’s Own Immigration Backlash
item.description: The response to a new visa for skilled foreign workers has caught even the Chinese government by surprise.
